statement.name: final
statement.parts: SELECT M1.SIIRESAKI_CD ,M1.SIIRESAKI_SEISIKI_NM ,M1.SIIRESAKI_SEISIKI_NMK ,M1.SIIRESAKI_RYAKU_NM ,M1.SIIRESAKI_RYAKU_NMK ,M1.KANOUSUGOE_KANOUTORIHIKI_FLG ,M1.ADD_YMD ,M1.ADD_TM ,M1.ADDTAN_CD ,M1.UPD_YMD ,M1.UPD_TM ,M1.UPD_TANCD ,M1.SAKUJYO_YMD ,M1.SAKUJYO_FLG ,M1.JYUSIN_YMD ,M1.JYUSIN_TM FROM MDMT0020 M1 WHERE M1.SIIRESAKI_CD =
